name: Hell Sucker
description:
Mosquitos love blood! Very very much! And this one particular one found a demonic book describing a hellish ritual that will bring seas of blood into the world! But that blood isnt just by itslef, its incased in demons! Those filthy, ravenous creatures will kill anything they see, so protect yourself! And... FEED.

Made for the BTP Jam #3, theme was "less is more" so i kinda interpreted it literally and just made a really simple and small but somewhat polished game.
